feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.26.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Quick fix for worker/server tests expecting missing messaging by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13693
  • Add support for file uploads with custom S3 endpoints by @CSLTech in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13395
  • Handle invalid content-dispositions, still allow REST download by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13694
  • remove file size limit on self host by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13696
  • Edit app metadata UX updates. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13685
  • Fix JSON error when editing rows in modal that contain unset attachment fields by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13698

New Contributors

  • @CSLTech made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.3...2.26.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rework table height to support percentages again by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13683
  • SQS cleanup (tables and apps) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13689
  • Reduce googleapi calls by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13704
  • Download images rather than returning binary responses from REST queries by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13710
  • Fixing CLI logging by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13716
  • Disallowing arrays for single types (attachment and user) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13717
  • Observe size changes in tabs by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13724
  • Table column initial width setting by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13610
  • Signature field and component support by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13418
  • Remove most of the date mocking in search.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13726
  • Allow closing options pickers by clicking again by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13725
  • Added the ability to disable automations by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13667
  • Chart Component Fixes/Improvements. Adds Tooltip to Provide Context on Component Input Types by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13538
  • Make Builder App Section Navigation Tabs Anchors by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13626
  • Removed subtype check when creating a formula column by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13733
  • Making progress towards deleting sql.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13734
  • Optimise the reverse method in sqlAlias.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13739

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.26.4...2.27.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Included blob: in worker-src Content Security Policy header. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13727

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.0...2.27.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prefill card blocks by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13527
  • Unable to load grid when using external postgres by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13714

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.1...2.27.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.27.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Misc fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13746
  • Handle dateonly types as date only ISO by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13747
  • Move more tests out of sql.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13740
  • Validate time fields by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13753
  • Prevent changing date or time only when fetched by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13752
  • Time constraints by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13755
  • Enum columns unexpectedly breaking fix by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13756

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.27.2...2.27.3
